title: Build error for opencv with gcc@9.3.0

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
<!--*Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the
report please:*
1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively!
-->
Hi,
I'm getting an error while building opencv via spack (all other dependencies have been imported and installed correctly). I attach below the requested information, plus I'm compiling using gcc@9.3.0 and linking to python@3.7.6, also available via spack modules.
As detailed below, spack install opencv results in build errors mentioning these GOMP references:
```console
../../lib/libopencv_core.so.4.2.0: undefined reference to `GOMP_loop_nonmonotonic_dynamic_next'
../../lib/libopencv_core.so.4.2.0: undefined reference to `GOMP_loop_nonmonotonic_dynamic_start'
```
Any suggestion? Should I compile any package with some specific option?
Thanks for your help!

### Spack version
<!-- Add the output to the command below -->
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-355-3aa225c
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install opencv
```
